originalText.text: Jacob Korder is an amazing attorney!  From our first meeting, Jacob explained everything to me in terms that I could easily understand and was very honest and transparent from the start.  Jacob also met with me right before my hearing to go over what to expect and that really helped calm my nerves.  Thanks to Jacob, we won the case!  If anyone is looking for a kind, respectful and knowledgeable unemployment lawyer, Jacob is definitely the guy to go to.

originalText.text: Jacob is a true PROFESSIONAL. He treats you like family from start to finish and honestly gives you more of an EXPERIENCE than anything. Jacob won my case with ease! He’s so thorough with his procedure and leaves you feeling comfortable the entire process. I would DEFINITELY RECOMMEND Jacob and Korder law to any of my family and friends! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

originalText.text: Very helpful and knowledgeable. Jacob helped me with unemployment a few years back. More recently, he provided a very helpful consultation with my employment contract. I wouldn't hesitate to use his services again or refer friends and family to Mr. Korder.

originalText.text: Jacob was amazing! I needed a lawyer to review my employment contract in a pinch, and he was highly responsive, kind, knowledgeable, and professional. His help was so appreciated, and I highly recommend - 5 stars!

originalText.text: Mr Korder is THE BEST!!! He has been so helpful all throughout my whole case! He was able to calm me down from all the anxiety i was  going through this, he is an attorney not a therapist. Lol he was always very accessible, responds immediately to any emails or calls,  this was my first time having to go through anything like this he was beyond patient with preparing for this case, Wow he was so diligent, and dependable when it came to any concerns i may have had, if you are looking to win Look no FURTHER!! HE IS THE RIGHT ONE...Mr Korder honestly exceed my expectations.  He is Highly recommended!” Thank you once again for my VICTORY.....
